suggestions.issue: Missing content types: technology, sustainability, research
suggestions.recommendation: Try searching the company website manually for pages related to: technology, sustainability, research. These sections may use different URLs or require navigation through menus.
Look for R&D pages, innovation hubs, technology partnerships, or digital transformation sections on the website.
Check for "Our Locations", "Global Operations", or "Where We Operate" sections that may list geographic presence.

verification_steps.description: Visit the company website and navigate through main menu items to identify any missed sections.
Annual reports often contain comprehensive market and technology information. Search for PDF downloads.
Recent news articles may reveal market activities not yet reflected on the corporate website.
Companies often have regional websites with localized content that may provide additional insights.
verification_steps.note: Look for language/region selectors on the main website

verification_steps.description: Corporate LinkedIn, Twitter, and press release pages often announce new initiatives before website updates.

overall_assessment: MEDIUM - Reasonable coverage but room for improvement.
